Insert a Quiz

Make your page interactive by adding one or multiple quizzes!

Each quiz contains an introduction page and a result page.

The demonstration Quiz! #1

Answer the questions correctly to unlock a prize!

Start

Result!

Correct:

Incorrect:

  1. Alamosaurus was found in which country?

    1. France
    2. U.S.A
    3. Mongolia

  2. Which was the smallest known member of the titanosaur family?

    1. Hypacrosaurus
    2. Maiasaura
    3. Magyarosaurus
